oostreliyanu jathikayanma mehi pawidi wi oostreliyanu mahadwipaya pura daham suwanda pathira wima imahath sathutaki.anya aagamikayan wadi prathishathayak jiwathwana oostreliyanu mahadwipaye, oostreliyawe sidni nagarayata kilomitar 100 ka pamana durakin pihiti katumba pradeshaye sundara gammanayaka darshaniya kandu watiyak pamula, oostreliyanu prathama bauddha wiharaya pihitiyeya.oostreliyanu jathika bauddhayan wisinma idikirim sandaha uradenu labu me wiharaye samarambhaka 40 wani sanwathsaraya pasugiyada samaranu labiya.aaranya senasanayak lesa 1972 di pujyapada rathmalane somaloka swamin wahanse wisin aarambha karannata yeduni.

sambuddhathwa jayanthi warshaya awasan kirime punyeithsawaya thai්ranikayika mahanayaka himiwarunge ha maha sangharathnaye pradhanathwayen saha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sahabhagithwayen labana masa (03) wana dina araliyagaha mandiraye di pawathwimata thiranaya kara thibe.edinata dasa awurudu wadapiliwelak da prakashayata pathkirimata niyamitha bawa agamathi di.mu jayarathna mahatha pawasiya.2600wani sambuddhathwa jayanthi janadhipathi meheyum kamituwa thai්ranikayika maha sangharathnaye pradhanathwayen, agamathi di.mu jayarathna mahathage sahabhagithwayen wisumpaya agamathi nila niwase pereda (27) ras wu awasthawe me thiranawalata elambai bawa hethema kiweya.buddhashasana panath ketumpatha, bauddha wihara dewalagam panath ketumpatha, bauddha prakashana niyamanaya kirime panath ketumpatha, dasasil mathawan pilibanda panath ketumpatha yana panath ketumpath wala idiri katayuthu sandaha kriyamarga ganima da niyamitha bawa jayarathna mahatha sandahan kaleya.sama pasalakatama budu dahama iganwimata wenama panthikamarayak wen kirima, budu dahama iganwimata sudusukamlath guruwarun pathkirima, udasana pasal raswim waladi hangimen yuthuwa wandana mana kirimata huru karawima, pasal bauddha samithi pihituwa ema samithiwala niladharinta nayakathwa puhunuwa labadima, 2600wani sambuddhathwa jayanthi sihiwatanayak lesa anga sampurna rajaye widyalayak bauddhayan wenuwen aarambha kara pawathwagena yama, bhikshu liyapadinchi kirime lekhana pahasuwen labaganime wadapiliwalak sakas kirima athulu pradhana karunu 16 k mema dasa awurudu wadapiliwalata athulath bawada ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.
pujakaya kiyanne apiwa mawapu dewiyan ekka paniwuda huwamaru karaganne ethanin kiyala."
ethuman wisin athsan karala rajya mudrawa thabapu sannas pathraya rajya uthsawayak mangul maduwe pawathwala abhinawa mahanayaka himiyan wetha janadhipathithuma wisin pirinamanawa.
